Gumercinda is very grateful for the help that has been given. She takes her leave with a big hug, knowing that she will accomplish all of her goals.

loans.use: to invest in buying natural products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric to embroider aprons.

loans.name: Mi Niño Jesus Iv Programa Group

texts.es: Hola desde Perú,les presento a un grupo conformado por 5  personas  emprendedoras  y con mucha creatividad para los    negocios. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal “ mi niño Jesús  de IV programa ” una de ellas es la Sra. Jacqueline de 32 años de edad es una señora muy empeñosa, y  trabaja vendiendo ropa ya que tiene un pequeño local de venta de ropa   en su casa y así poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus dos hijos. con el resiente prestamos lo invertirá en prendas de vestir como camisas y blusas para su posterior venta.  la Sra. Jacqueline se siente contenta  con el préstamo otorgado y agradecida con Kiva y Edaprospo por la confianza brindada  con un cordial saludo se despide, sabiendo  que cumplirá todos sus metas.
texts.en:
Hello from Peru! May I introduce you to a group made up of five enterprising people with plenty of creativity for business: the members of the "Mi Niño Jesús de IV Programa" communal bank. 

One of the members is Jacqueline, 32, a very persevering woman who makes a living selling clothing. She has a small area for selling clothes in her house. This business allows her to give her two children a better quality of life. 

She will invest this loan in articles of clothing, such as shirts and blouses, which she will then sell. Jacqueline is happy with this loan and grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for their trust in her. 

With kind regards, she says goodbye, knowing that she will accomplish all of her goals.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Solidaridad De Jicamarca Group

texts.es: Hola desde  Perú, les presento a un grupo conformado por 7  personas  emprendedoras  y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “solidaridad de jicamarca” una de ellas es la Sra. Eugenia de 53 años de edad y madre un hijo el cual e su motivo de lucha constante.  la Sra. Eugenia es muy trabajadora y con grandes deseos de superación. la Sra. Eugenia es una maestra jubilada que desde muy temprano se dedica a la atención en su pequeña bodega que tiene en su casa y eventualmente realiza servicios de costura.con  el préstamo otorgado realizara compras para suministrar de abarrotes y verduras para su bodega  y a si poder mejorar su calidad de vida.  en el futuro le gustaría ampliar su bodega y a si poder tener mayores ingresos económicos. la Sra. Eugenia se despide muy agradecida con kiva y Edaprospo por la ayuda brindada y la confianza depositada en ella.
texts.en: Greetings from Peru! We present to you a group of 7 entrepreneurial people who have a lot of creativity regarding business. They are the members of the community group "Solidarity of Jicamarca." One of the members is Eugenia who is 53 years old and the mother of a son who is her motivation for constant struggle. Eugenia is a hard worker and she has a great desire to get ahead. Eugenia is a retired teacher who, starting very early in the morning, attends to her little bodega that she has in her house and later she performs sewing services. With the loan she has been granted she will complete purchases of supplies of groceries and vegetables for her bodega and through this she will be able to improve her quality of life. In the future she would like to enlarge her bodega to obtain better earnings. Eugenia is very grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for the help they have given her and the confidence they have instilled in her.

loans.use: to buy groceries and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Bok Guis-Guis De Birbirane Group

texts.fr: Elles sont cinq à s’être réunis en groupe de crédit : Bok Guis Guis. Elles logent le même village et font toute du commerce. Madame Fatou est la présidente du groupe et elle évolue dans la vente de denrées alimentaires. Elle gère une mini boutique ou elle vend de l’huile, du sucre, des bonbons et divers. Elle a une expérience de plus de 15 ans. Elle appuie à la dépense quotidienne de la famille et a d’autres charges comme celles liées à l’exploitation. Elle en est à sa première expérience de crédit et cela lui permettra de diversifier ses produits et de pouvoir améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille.
texts.en:
These five persons joined to form the Bok Guis Guis credit group. They live in the same village and all are involved in retail trade.

Mrs. Fatou is the president of the group whose activity is selling food products. She manages a mini-shop where she sells oil, sugar, sweets and various other products. She has over 15 years of experience.

She supports her family's daily expenses as well as other business-related expenses. This is her first credit loan experience, that will allow her to diversify her products and improve her family's food conditions.

loans.use: buy food products (oil, sugar, sweets, various products) to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Ande Suxali Birbirane Group

texts.fr: And Sukali Birbirane est un groupe de crédit qui est composé de cinq membres qui évoluent dans le commerce. Elle est l’ainé du groupe et fait office de présidente, elle s’appelle Nogaye et  évolue dans la vente d’huile de palme, de poisson séché, arachide, et huile artisanale. Elle a une expérience de 2 ans. Il faut dire que grâce au crédit, elle pourra se charger dorénavant de la scolarité des enfants puisse qu’elle pourra avoir un fond de commerce qui lui permettra de ne pas être en rupture et de générer régulièrement  un bénéfice.
texts.en: And Sukali Birbirane is a loan group consisting of 5 members who are all retailers. Nogaye is the group elder and holds the position of group president. She sells palm oil, dried fish, groundnuts and home-made oil.  She has 2 years experience in this line of work. From now on, thanks to this loan, she will be able to make sure her children get an education, as she will have funds allowing her to avoid stock shortages and make a steady profit.

loans.use: to buy dried and smoked fish, palm oil and groundnuts for resale.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es: Saludos  desde Perú,   les presento a un grupo conformado por 7  personas emprendedoras    y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “NUEVO AMANECER” una de ellas es la Sra. Lorenza de 48 años de edad soltera y madre de  4 hijos, ella se dedica diariamente a la venta de ropa,  el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de educación de sus hijos,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender sus productos y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en una  línea de ropa tanto para hombre como para mujer. A la vez  la Sra. Lorenza y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos   con Kiva y Edaprospo por el préstamo otorgado    y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en: Greetings from Peru! We present to you a group of 7 entrepreneurs with lots of business creativity. These are the members of the community group "New Dawn." One of the members is Lorenza who is 48 years old, single and the mother of 4 children. She works every day selling clothing. This activity has generated earnings that cover the education expenses of her children. In the future she would like to have her own store where she can sell her products and obtain larger earnings. With the loan she has been granted she will invest it in a line of clothes that is equally for men and women. Together Lorenza and all of the members are grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for granting them the loan and for the confidence they have instilled in them. She left us with the promise that she will complete all of her scheduled payments.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Pamela Ivett

texts.es: La señora Pamela habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su familia lucha dia a dia para obtener mejores condiciones de vida. su esposo es trabaja como cadete de un taxi, ella es comerciante, y su mayor sueño es terminar su casa. con este credito compraran materiales como: cemento, Ceramica, Arena etc. Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le han Brindado.
texts.en: Pamela lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe. With her family, she fights day after day to obtain better living conditions. Her husband works as a taxi driver, and she is a vendor. Pamela's biggest dream is to finish their home. With this loan, they will buy materials like cement, ceramic, sand, etc. She is grateful to Afodenic and Kiva for the support and funds they've provided.

loans.use: buy construction materials.

loans.name: Nery Patricia

texts.es: La señora Nery habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposo y famila, ella sueña con que su negocio algun dia pueda crecer y convertirlo en un un restaurante, con este credito que se le esta otorgando comprara Abarotes como Arroz, Aceite, Carne, Paltanos etc. lo necesario para la preparacion de los diferentes platillos que ofrece en su negocio. Agradece el Apoyo y la confianza que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva lehan brindado.
texts.en:
Nery lives in the town of Ticuantepe with her husband and family.  She dreams of being able to have a bigger business one day and of turning it into a restaurant.

With this loan that she's being granted she'll buy groceries such as rice, oil, meat, bananas, etc.--what she needs to make the various dishes she serves in her business.

She's grateful for the support and trust that AFODENIC and Kiva have offered her.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Juana Virginia

texts.es:
La señora Juana Virginia esta casada, tiene 23 años de edad, cursó los 2 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijos pequeño, se dedica a la confección de tejidos, específicamente la elaboración de blusas, playeras y gabachas, trabajo que inicio por iniciativa propia, hasta el momento lleva  4 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

solicita un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de telas para blusas de varios colores, como también hilos,  con estos espera mejorar su producción y tener un negocio con mas ventas.
texts.en:
Juana Virginia, 23, is married and has a young child.  She completed two years of primary education.

She earns a living making textiles, specifically blouses, t-shirts, and coats.  She started the job on her own initiative and currently has four years of experience.  She has the help of her husband who works in the same job.

She's requesting a loan to buy fabric for blouses in a variety of colors as well as thread.  With these items she hopes to improve her production and have a business with more sales.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread

loans.name: Unidos Para El Exito Group

texts.es: Saludos  desde Perú,   les presento a un grupo conformado por 5  personas emprendedoras y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL ÉXITO” una de ellas es la Sra. maría de 51 años de edad viuda y con 5 hijos, ella se dedica diariamente a la venta de jugos de fruta el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de educación de sus hijos,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder generar mayores ingresos económicos para ella y su  familia.  Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en compras de diversos productos tales como piña, manzanas naranjas para su jugueria. La Sra. maría  se encuentra muy agradecida con  Kiva y Edaprospo  por la ayuda brindada, se despide con un fuerte abraso y con la promesa que cumplirá todas sus metas.
texts.en:
Greetings from Perú. I introduce you to a group made up of 5 entrepreneurs with a lot of creativity for business. These are the members of the communal group "United for Success." One of these members is María, a 51-year-old widow with 5 children. María works everyday selling fruit juice which has been generating earnings to be able to cover the cost of her children's education. 

In the future, she would like to have her own store where she could be able to generate more income for she and her family. She will invest the granted loan in the purchases of diverse products such as pineapple, apples, and oranges for her juice stand. 

María is very grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for the help they've provided. She says goodbye with a big hug and with the promise that she will meet all of her goals.

loans.use: purchase products for her juice stand.

loans.name: Aura Dilia

texts.es: La señora Aura, mujer trabajadora y luchadora, habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, su esposo la apoya en todas las decisiones ya que son para la mejora del hogar, el labora para una empresa privada y ella trabaja en una tienda que ofrece servicios telefonicos. su mayor dificultad es que no pueden recaudar de una sola vez el dinero para comprar los materiales que necesitan. con este nuevo credito compraran  los materiales para continuar la construccion de casa, Agradecen el apoyo de Afodenic y Fondos Kiva por la confianza brindada
texts.en:
Aura, a hardworking and determined woman, lives in the town of Ticuantepe. Her husband works for a private company, and he supports her in all of the decisions that are made for home improvement.  Aura works in a store that offers telephone services. 

Their biggest difficulty is that they can't raise all of the money they need at one to buy the materials they need. With this new loan, they will buy the materials to continue the construction of their home. Aura and her husband are grateful to Afodenic and Kiva for the support, funds and confidence they've provided.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Gladis Clementina

texts.es:
La señora Gladis Clementina esta casada, tiene 40 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 5 hijos 3 de los cuales  están estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa típica, negocio que inicio por voluntad propia, y la necesidad de contribuir a los ingresos familiares, lleva 8 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la albañilería.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de blusas, cortes, delantales, fajas, y entre otros necesarios para su venta, ella espera tener un negocio amplio, y en el futuro tener un local de venta de ropa típica y seguir apoyando a su  familia especialmente sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gladis Clementina is married and 40 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study. She has 5 children, 3 of which are studying. She works as a merchant, selling traditional clothing. She started this business on her own initiative, due to the need to contribute to the family income. She has 8 years of experience, and she can count on the support of her husband, who works as a mason. 

She is requesting a loan which she will use to buy blouses, skirts, aprons, bodices, and other items necessary for her sales. She hopes to expand her business, and in the future to have a shop where she can sell traditional clothing and continue supporting her family, especially her children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Sueno Del Futuro Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento SUENO DEL FUTURO está  compuesto por nueve integrantes, siete mujeres y dos varones,  El  presidenta del banco es el Sr. Eduardo  tiene 43 años, casado tiene seis hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, el  se dedica  a la construcción y remodelación de viviendas, el es albañil contratista, el vive en la localidad de El Torno,  este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Eduardo  va a utilizar este préstamo para la compra de material de construcción ya que esto le permitirá realizar su trabajo de manera eficiente ya que tiene contratos que cumplir, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su trabajo, El Sr. Eduardo  va a utilizar los beneficios en comprar Herramientas para su trabajo ya que las que tiene se le están gastando y necesita renovar para realizar un mejor trabajo, El Sr. Eduardo  es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada  en la otorgación del crédito ya que esta es su única  actividad que le permite mantenerse.
texts.en: The “Sueño del Futuro” comunal bank is made up of nine members. Seven are women and two are men. The president of the group is Eduardo. He is 43 years old, married, and has six school-aged children. He works in house construction and remodeling; he’s a contract bricklayer. He lives in the town of El Torno. This loan is his second with this institution. Eduardo will use this loan to buy construction materials that will allow him to do his job in an efficient manner, since he has contracts he needs to finish. His reason for requesting the loan is to continue improving his work. Eduardo will use it to buy tools for his work. The ones he has are getting old and he needs to get new ones in order to do a better job. Eduardo is a very hardworking person and he feels happy because of the opportunity provided to him through the loan, since this work is how he supports himself.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruits and snack foods.

loans.name: Lidia Veronica

texts.es:
La señora Lidia Veronica esta soltera, tiene  24 años de edad, curso los grados de educacional primaria, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, negocio que inicio por necesidad de contar con un ingreso fijo y contante para el sostenimiento de su familia, lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá parea la compra de hilos de varias clases y colores,  para tener mas producción y diseños de tejidos, espera en el futuro tener varios telares y trabajadores.
texts.en:
Lidia Veronica, 24, received an elementary education and earns a living making traditional woven fabric.  She started her business to earn a fixed income to support her family.  She has three years' experience.

She is requesting a loan to buy different kinds of yarn in a variety of colors so she can produce more fabric designs.  She hopes to have several looms and paid employees one day.

loans.use: To buy yarn for work.

loans.name: Raul De Jesús

texts.es:
Raúl de 45 años de edad, es una persona en situación de discapacidad, debido a que sufrió un accidente en una motocicleta y perdió la movilidad de su mano derecha. A raíz de esta situación se vio impedido a seguir laborando en la empresa en donde se desempeñaba como operario de maquinaria, por lo cual se vio en la necesidad de mirar nuevos horizontes y a buscar una fuente de empleo para sostener a su familia. 
Con su liquidación y el apoyo de su esposa, Raúl su propio negocio en el cual labora comercializando productos de la canasta familiar. 
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de surtido debido a que desea implementar nuevas líneas de productos que le demandan sus clientes.
Espera que con esta inversión mejore las ventas y pueda garantizarle a su esposa y  a sus dos hijos mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Raúl is 45 years old and he has a disability. He was in a motorcycle accident and lost the ability to move his right hand. Due to this situation, he could not continue working at the business where he worked as a machine operator. He needed to find new horizons and look for a source of work to provide for his family.

With his severance pay, and the support of his wife, Raúl started his own business in which he sells products that people need every day.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy stock, because he wants to start selling new product lines that his clients are requesting.

He hopes that with this investment he will be able to guarantee his wife and two children better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy basic products of daily use.

loans.name: Sandra Eugenia

texts.es:
Sandra es una joven de 27 años, que lucha por sacar a sus 3 hijos menores de edad adelante. Su situación económica no le permite dedicarse de tiempo completo a su hogar, pero, su amor de madre no le permite dejarlos solos en casa, razón por la cual se dedica  a la cría y engorde de porcinos en su vivienda, lo cual considera que es una gran ventaja porque le permite cuidar de su familia al tiempo que genera ingresos. Con esta actividad ha logrado generar el sustento para la alimentación y la educación de sus hijos.
Su mayor sueño es tener una finca, debido a que está convencida que el campo es el mejor lugar para vivir, y cree que podría mejorar su situación económica combinando la porcicultura con la agricultura. Aunque sus sueños no paran, esta mujer es conciente que debe ahorrar para cumplir su deseo.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de cerdos y cuido para sacar una producción de calidad.
Espera que con su esfuerzo y disciplina su calidad de vida mejore, garantizándoles a sus hijos una mejor educación.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 27 year old young lady who works hard to get her three young children ahead.  Her love for them prevents her from leaving them alone at home alone, so she raises pigs.  She considers this to be a great advantage because it allows her family to generate income.  She has managed to generate income to feed and educate her children.

Her greatest dream is to have a farm because she is convinced that the country is the best place to live and she believes that the combination of raising crops and pigs would put her in better financial situation.  Although her dreams don’t stop, she knows that she has to save up in order to achieve her wishes.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy pigs to raise and provide a good quality production.

She expects that she will be able to improve her quality of life through her efforts and discipline and that she will be able to guarantee an education to her children.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Sara Rosa

texts.es:
Sara de 54 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos, por los cuales trabaja fuertemente a fin de ofrecerles mejores condiciones de vida. Labora diariamente de cuatro de la tarde a once de la noche vendiendo chunchurría, actividad que aprendió gracias a un hermano, quien posteriormente le cedió el negocio para que ella lo trabajara. Hoy es la propietaria, por  lo cual desea convertirlo en el lugar más visitado por los residentes del lugar, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de espátula, pinzas, mesa y sillas con el fin de ofrecer un mejor servicio, ya que muchos de sus clientes le han manifestado la incomodidad de no haber un lugar donde sentarse mientras degustan su producto.

Su mayor sueño es poder adquirir una vivienda para garantizarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y no tener que preocuparse cada mes por la renta. Adicional a esto, sueña con que sus dos hijos menores de edad puedan ingresar a la universidad y convertirse en grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Sara, 54 years old, is a single mother of four children, for whom she works hard with the goal of offering them better living conditions. She works daily from four in the afternoon to eleven at night selling chunchurría , something that she learned thanks to one of her brothers, who gave her his business so that she could eventually take over. Today she is the owner, and she would like to convert it into the place that is most visited by the local residents. She has asked for a loan in order to buy a spatula, tongs, a table and chairs with the goal of offering better service, since many of her customers have expressed their discomfort at not having a place to sit while enjoying her product.

Her greatest dream is to be able to buy a house in order to guarantee a better quality of life and not have to worry about rent every month. In addition, she dreams that her two younger children can enroll in university and become great professionals.

loans.use: to buy a spatula, tongs, a table and chairs.

loans.name: Yorfi Ledy

texts.es:
Yorfi, a sus 34 años de edad, es una mujer que tiene claro que su familia está por encima de las riquezas y los placeres del mundo. A sus 20 años quedó en embarazo de su primer hijo, por lo cual decidió dedicarse al hogar y al cuidado de su pequeño. Gracias a una tía Yorfi aprendió el oficio de la confección y se dedico a esta actividad desde su hogar, dividiendo el tiempo entre los quehaceres del hogar, el cuidado de su hijo y la confección, con el fin de generar ingresos y colaborarle a su esposo con los gastos ya que al agrandarse la familia las necesidades se incrementaron. 
Desde hace tres años decidió organizar su negocio y cambiar su trabajo informal por la creación de una microempresa, actualmente labora de ocho de la mañana a seis de la tarde.

Su mayor sueño es poder incrementar su planta y equipo, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el fin de comprar una máquina fileteadora y ofrecer un mejor servicio. Espera que esta inversión le permita aumentar sus ingresos y garantizarles a sus tres hijos menores de edad una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Yorfi, 34, is a woman who firmly believes that family is more important than all the riches and pleasures in the world.  At age 20, she became pregnant with her first son and decided to stay at home and care for him.  Thanks to one of her aunts, Yorfi learned how to sew and works out of her home as a seamstress, splitting her time between household chores, caring for her son and sewing.  Her aim is to generate an income to help her husband cover the household expenses since the family needs have increased.

Three years ago she decided to reorganize her work and turn her informal job into a small business.  Currently, she works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

Her goal is to expand her business and buy more equipment.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine so she can provide better service.  She hopes this investment will allow her to increase her income and guarantee that her three minor children receive a quality education.

loans.use: To buy an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Damas Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
Domitila es miembro del  grupo Damas Triunfadoras

Domitila tiene 48 años es casada y tiene 01 hijo. Ella es casada y vive con su familia,  el grupo lo conforman 08 socias donde ella tiene el cargo de secretaria. Domitila se dedica al negocio de abarrotes, tiene un puesto en un mercado donde vende diferentes productos como  menestras, fideos, arroz, azúcar etc. Son 06 años que tiene su negocio vendiendo en el mismo lugar, sus clientelas son en su mayoría amas de casa, quienes acuden diariamente a su negocio para realizar sus compras, gracias a su trabajo apoya a su esposo con algunos gastos de la casa, sobretodo invierten en la educación de su hijo. Domitila  utilizara el dinero de su préstamo para incrementar su negocio con mas productos de abarrotes, más adelante desea ampliar su negocio para atender a mas clientes.
Domitila está muy entusiasmada por saber que personas de todo el mundo la van apoyar en su negocio. A Todos los inversionistas, a ella le gustaría decir ¡Muchas gracias!
En la foto es la segunda de la izquierda.
texts.en:
Domitila is a member of the group "Damas Triunfadoras" ("Triumphant Ladies"). 

Domitila is 48 years old and is married with 1 child. She is married and lives with her family. The group is made up of 8 members and she has the role of secretary. She works in the grocery business. She has a stand at a market where she sells different products, like beans, noodles, rice, sugar, etc. She has had her business in the same spot for 6 years. Her customers are mainly housewives, who come to her daily to do their shopping. 

Thanks to her work she supports her spouse with some of their household expenses, especially with paying for their child's education. Domitila will use the money from the loan to stock her stand with more items. In the future she wants to expand her business to be able to serve more customers.

Domitila is very excited to know that people from all over the world will support her business. To all the lenders, she would like to say, "Thank you very much!"

In the photo she is the second from the left.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell.

loans.name: El Banquito Del Ahorro Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo El Banquito del Ahorro

María es una de las socias del grupo, ella  tiene 38 años, es separada con 03 hijos. María trabaja vendiendo productos de belleza de diferentes marcas, sus compradoras son amigas, vecinas y algunos familiares. Otra de las formas de generar ingresos para su familia es el alquiler de habitaciones en su casa, para eso acondiciono algunos cuartos que ha puesto en alquiler, con el dinero de su nuevo préstamo quiere terminar la construcción de su segundo piso para continuar implementando mas habitaciones, por otro lado desea que su negocio de belleza siga creciendo,  más adelante tener un lugar para vender sus productos y aumentar sus ingresos. 
¡María agradece su apoyo! En la foto es la que viste  pantalón jean y blusa blanca
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!  This the the Banquito del Ahorro group.

María, 38, is one of the members of the group.  She's separated and has three children.  María works selling different brands of beauty products.  Her buyers are friends, neighbors, and some family members.  Another way she generates income for her family is renting rooms in her house, for which she renovated some rooms she has rented.

With the money from her new loan she wants to finish building her second floor to continue setting up more rooms.

She also wants her beauty business to continue to grow and later have a place to sell her products and increase her income.

María is grateful for your help!  In the photo she's the one wearing blue jeans and a white blouse.

loans.use: to install rooms

loans.name: Beatriz Antonia

texts.es:
Beatriz, habita en la ciudad de Estelí, 25 años de edad, madre de tres hijos, de oficio comerciante, es dueña de una pulpería. Inicio vendiendo mercadería variada como bisutería y cosméticos cuando tenía 19 años de edad. Actualmente tiene una pulpería en la cual vende productos de limpieza , aceite, arroz, huevo, pan, frijoles, papel higiénico, pasta dental son pocos productos pero son los que más vende a diario. Ella dice que le genera ingresos a diario, la mayoría de sus clientes provienen de su barrio y de la fábrica que esta frente su negocio por tanto la afluencia de clientes es constante.  
Ella esta solicitando el crédito para comprar arroz, aceite, azúcar, gaseosas, carne, caramelo snacks y materiales escolares. Su meta próxima es surtir su negocio con más productos que necesita vender y en lo futuro ampliar el local de su pulpería comprando estantes y vitrinas.
texts.en:
Beatriz lives in the city of Estelí. She is 25 years old and is the mother of three children. She works in commerce as the owner of a small grocery store. She began by selling a variety of merchandise, such as costume jewelry and cosmetics, when she was 19 years old. She currently has a small grocery store where she sells cleaning products, cooking oil, rice, eggs, bread, beans, toilet paper, and toothpaste. They’re few products, but they’re what sell best on a daily basis. She says that she has income every day. The majority of her customers are from her neighborhood and from the factory that is in front of her business, so she has a steady stream of customers.

She is requesting the loan to buy rice, cooking oil, sugar, soft drinks, meat, caramels, snacks, and school supplies. Her next goal is to stock the business with more products that she wants to sell and, in the future, to expand the area of her store and buy shelves and vitrines.

loans.use: to buy rice, cooking oil, sugar, soft drinks, meat, caramels, snacks, and school supplies.

loans.name: Angel María

texts.es: Angel es un señor  que se ha dedicado en los últimos cuatro años a crear ganado de doble propósito, su comercio consiste en comprar ganado de engorde y ganado lechero, luego de que su ganado obtiene el peso ideal lo vende en las ferias ganaderas locales y con la producción de leche elabora productos  como queso, mantequilla, natilla y otros, los cuales vende en el comercio de su comunidad, para ampliar su negocio y comprar más ganado está solicitando un millón cuarenta mil colones (¢1.040.000), con este crédito  logará sus metas y obtendrá mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Ángel has dedicated the last four years to raising cattle, with two purposes. His business consists of buying cattle for fattening and also dairy cattle. When his cattle reach the ideal weight, he sells them at the local markets, and with the milk they produce he makes products such as cheese, butter, milk custards, and other items, which he sells in his community. In order to grow his business and buy more cattle, he is requesting one million forty thousand Costa Rican colones (CRC 1,040,000). With this loan he will achieve his goals and earn a larger income.

loans.use: to buy cattle for meat production and for milk production

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.es: Jacqueline  es  una joven comerciante,  tiene una tienda de ropa en su casa, pero también vende su mercadería en las playas cercanas a su localidad, ella quiere aprovechar la  época de verano  para comprar y vender prendas  playeras ,  sandalias y otros artículos muy usados en la zona, además desea surtir su tienda con más artículos como bisutería, y cosméticos. Solicita un crédito por trescientos cincuenta mil colones (¢350.000) para este propósito
texts.en:
Jacqueline is a young shopkeeper. She has a clothes shop at her house but also sells her merchandise on the beaches near where she lives. She wants to take advantage of the summer season to buy and sell t-shirts, sandals and other articles of clothing often used in the area. She also hopes to supply her shop with more items such as jewellery and cosmetics. 

She is asking for a loan of three hundred and fifty thousand colones (¢350.000) for this purpose.

loans.use: to buy clothes and jewellery.

loans.name: Ivannia

texts.es: Ivannia  y su familia iniciaron hace tres años un proyecto de panadería el cual han tratado de mejorar y ampliar cada año, ellos quieren extenderse tanto en área física como en clientela, se proponen abastecer del producto a otros negocios y a panaderos ambulantes , para ello solicitan un crédito de trescientos mil colones(¢300.000) para comprar materiales de construcción y ampliar su local  comercial y algunas mesas para amasar,  lo que les ayudará a aumentar la producción de pan ya que dispondrán de más espacio para trabajar.
texts.en:
Ivannia and her family started their bakery project three years ago.  Every year they have tried to improve the business and want to expand both their physical location and customer base.  They also want to supply products to other businesses and street peddlars.  

They are requesting a loan of 300,000 CRC to buy construction materials to expand their commercial location and to add more tables to make dough.  This will help increase bread production as they are in need of more workspace.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to expand her bakery.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta  tiene una granja de la cual dependen sus ingresos económicos para mantener a sus tres hijos y a su madre , ella quiere ampliar la producción de pollos y huevos, los cuales vende a comerciantes más grandes , ha conseguido ser proveedora de varios negocios  y por eso solicita un crédito de trescientos cincuenta mil colones (¢350.000) para comprar más pollos pequeños , alimento para  aves  y bebederos entre otros implementos de granja. Marta manifiesta estar muy alegre de  contar con este dinero a través del crédito  comunal.
texts.en: Marta has a farm, on which she depends for the income to maintain her three children and also her mother. She would like to expand her production of chicken and eggs, which she sells to larger merchants. She has successfully become a provider for several businesses, and for this reason she is requesting a loan for three hundred fifty thousand colones (¢350.000) to buy more small chickens, poultry feed, and watering devices, among other farm supplies. Marta comments that she is very happy to have access to these funds through the communal loan.

loans.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Zoni

texts.es: Zoni  es una mujer esforzada y deseosa de continuar sus estudios universitarios   y graduarse como educadora escolar, con esfuerzo propio a logrado  avanzar académicamente , necesita un crédito por setecientos mil colones (¢700.000) para  continuar estudiando y lograr sus metas  entre las cuales están obtener la licenciatura en educación media. Ella agradece la oportunidad de financiamiento  que se le está brindando  a través del crédito comunal.
texts.en: Zoni is a hard-working woman who wants to continue her university studies and graduate with a teaching certificate.  Through her own efforts she has been able to advance academically.   She needs a loan of 700,000 CRC to continue her education and meet her goals, among which is her intermediate education degree.  She is grateful for this loan opportunity through her communal bank.

loans.use: To buy books and pay for tuition.

loans.name: Jacquelline

texts.es: Jacqueline es una joven madre que apoya  a su hija en los estudios, su hija está iniciando  la universidad  y necesita comprar libros y  pagar las materias que llevará en   este curso lectivo. ella  solicita un crédito por quinientos mil colones (¢500.000) para hacer frente a estos gastos y lograr que su hija pueda preparase académicamente.
texts.en: Jacqueline is a young mother supporting her daughter as she begins her university education.  She needs to buy books and pay for tuition this year, and is requesting a loan of 500,000 CRC to be able to cover costs so her daughter can prepare herself academically.

loans.use: To buy university books and pay for tuition.

loans.name: María De Los Angeles

texts.es: María de los Angeles  está en segundo año de la universidad,  necesita completar el dinero para matricular las materias que llevará este año y comprar los libros y demás útiles universitarios, ella solicita un crédito por  trescientos cincuenta mil colones (¢350.000) para este objetivo. Su finalidad es graduarse en un futuro  en economía agrícola y para eso hace su mejor esfuerzo y manifiesta que logrará su meta con la ayuda de Dios y de este tipo de financiamiento.
texts.en: María de los Ángeles is in her second year of university. She needs to obtain the remaining funds that she needs in order to register for the classes she will take this year, and to buy books and other university supplies. She is requesting a loan of three-hundred fifty thousand Costa Rican colones (CRC 350,000) for this purpose. Her goal is to graduate with a degree in agricultural economics. In order to achieve this, she is making her best effort and affirms that she will achieve her goal with the help of God and this type of financing.

loans.use: to buy books and pay tuition

loans.name: Roldan

texts.es: Roldan es un joven que desea terminar de construir su casa porque quiere que sus hijos tengan un hogar seguro y confía que con las ventas de verdura y negocio de pulpería lograra este sueño, el no tuvo apoyo de sus padres para progresar en la vida y eso fue una dificultad muy grande para salir adelante, pero con sus propios esfuerzos cubre con los gastos de estudios de sus dos hijos y poya a su esposa. Este es su primer crédito que solicita para comprar bloque, cemento, hierro, piedrín, arena, piedra cantera para seguir levantando paredes, techo y ventanas y así concluir esta gran ilusión con su familia.
texts.en: Roldan is a young man who wants to finish building his house because he wants for his children to have a safe home. He is confident that through vegetable sales and his small grocery store business he will achieve his dream. He didn’t have the support of his parents to get ahead in life, and this was a big difficulty for him. But through his own work, he is covering the costs of studies for his two children and supports his wife. This is the first loan he is requesting to buy cement blocks, cement, rebar, gravel, sand, and quarry stone so that he can continue building the walls, roof, and windows and finish this big dream for his family.

loans.use: to buy cement blocks, cement, rebar, gravel, sand, and quarry stone

loans.name: Verónica Lisette

texts.es:
La Señorita. Verónica forma parte del banco comunal Pauteñitas, vive por una hermosa comunidad que pertenece al cantón de Paute, este lugar goza de un clima cálido, sus tierras son muy fértiles donde se cosechan las más hermosas flores, su geografía accidentada regalan hermosos paisajes donde se puede disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amables, gentil y aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señorita Verónica tiene 18 años, es soltera y vive con sus padres, su padre se dedica a la construcción y presta sus servicios como guardia de seguridad, su madre tiene un restaurante, no tienen casa propia y viven en una finca que cuidan.
 
Verónica está estudiando en el colegio, cursa su último año y le va muy bien en sus estudios. En casa les ayuda a sus padres a cuidar la hacienda y los fines de semana le ayuda a su madre en la preparación de la comida y en la atención de su restaurante. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir para la compra de víveres para el restaurante de su madre y también para el pago de la matrícula de la universidad. 

Su meta es ser profesional.
texts.en:
Verónica, a young woman, is a member of the communal bank "Pauteñitas." She lives in a beautiful community located in the Paute canton, a place with a warm climate and a fertile soil where the most beautiful flowers grow. The region’s uneven geography provides beautiful landscapes that make it easy to enjoy nature. Locals are kind and humble, and preserve their culture and traditions.

Verónica is eighteen years old, single and lives with her parents. Her father works in the construction sector and as a security guard; her mother has a restaurant. They do not own the house they live in, which is located in a farm they take care of.

Verónica is studying her last year at school and she is doing very well. At home, she helps her parents take care of the farm and during the weekends she helps her mother to cook and serve at the restaurant.

She will use this loan to buy supplies for her mother’s restaurant and also to pay for the university’s tuition fee. Her goal is to become a professional.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her mother's restaurant and pay for the university's tuition fee.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
La Señora. María está realizando el segundo crédito en el banco comunal Pauteñitas. Vive por una hermosa comunidad que pertenece al cantón de Paute, este lugar goza de un clima cálido, sus tierras muy fértiles donde se cosechan las más hermosas flores, su geografía accidentada regala hermosos paisajes donde se puede disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

Doña María tiene 47 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 23, 22, 20, 19 y 4 años, 4 de sus hijos son mayores de edad, trabajan y le ayudan economícamente, a mas de trabajar tres de ellos cursan los estudios universitario. Su esposo labora de albañil, la casa en la que viven es de su propia.

La Señora. María se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y para aportar a la economía de su casa se dedica a la cría y venta de pollos, cerdos, cuyes y ganado, también se dedica a la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar. 

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos.

Su meta es construir galpones más grandes para la crianza de pollos.
texts.en:
María is taking out a second loan in the Pauteñitas communal bank. She lives in the beautiful community in the canton of Paute. It has a warm climate and its fertile soil is where many flowers are harvested. It's irregular geography gives beautiful landscapes where nature can be enjoyed. Its people are friendly, kind and still maintain their culture and traditions.

María is 47 years old. She is married and in her marriage has had 5 children, aged 23, 22, 20, 19 and 4. Four of her children are grown. They work and help her financially. Besides working, they go to college. Her husband works as a bricklayer and they own the house they live in. 

María is a housewife and to help out with the family budget, she raises and sells chickens, pigs, guinea pigs and cattle. She also is a farmer and what she grows is for household consumption.

She is going to invest her loan in buying chickens. Her goal is to build bigger sheds to raise chickens.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Andrea Paulina

texts.es:
La Señorita Andrea se encuentra en el cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal Pauteñitas. Vive por una hermosa comunidad que pertenece al cantón de Paute, este lugar goza de un clima cálido, sus tierras muy fértiles donde se cosechan las más hermosas flores, su geografía accidentada regalan paisajes donde se puede disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señorita Andrea tiene 19 años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña de 2 meses de edad, vive en casa de sus padres, su padre es jardinero y su madre ama de casa, la casa en la que viven es de sus padres.

Andrea se dedica por el momento al cuidado de su hija y para solventar sus gastos se dedica a la cría de cuyes y tiene galpones con pollos a los cuales los vende en su cantón. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cuyes y alimento para animales. 

Su meta es crecer en la cría de estos animales
texts.en:
Andrea is on her fourth loan with the Pauteñitas communal bank.  She lives in a beautiful community in Paute Canton, which has a warm climate and fertile land where the prettiest flowers are grown.  The rugged landscape offers enjoyable natural views.  The people there are friendly and kind, and they still preserve their culture and traditions.

Andrea, 19, is the single mother of a two-month-old daughter.  She lives in her parents' house.  Her father is a gardener and her mother a housewife.  The house she lives in belongs to her parents.

To pay for her expenses she raises guinea pigs and has a shed for chickens, which she sells in her canton.

She's going to invest her new loan in buying chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed.

Her goal is to grow in raising these animals.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
La señora Blanca Estela esta soltera, tiene 28 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, ella se dedica a la venta de cheveres, inicio este negocio preparando cheveres sin una carreta y vendiéndolos de forma ambulante, ella lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que le   servirá para la compra de un carreta de cheveres, ella quiere ver su negocio prosperado y de esa forma seguirá apoyando a su familia. En el futuro ella quiere tener otros puntos de venta.
texts.en:
Blanca Estela is 28 years old, she is single and she did not have the chance to go to school. She engages in selling hot-dogs, and she has a 5-years’ experience in this filed. She started this activity preparing hot-dogs and then selling them as a street vendor but without a cart.

She is requesting a loan to buy a hot-dog cart. She wants to see her activity grow, as through this mean she will keep on supporting her family. In the future she would like to own other selling stalls.

loans.use: To buy a hot-dog cart.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Doña María de 56 años de edad tiene a su cargo al hijo menor de 14 años a quien da los estudios apoyada de su trabajo como empleada domestica le da lo mejor dentro de sus posibilidades sus otros hijos son mayores de edad, con sus esfuerzos y como madre soltera ha logrado que ellos sean independientes quienes ahora la apoyan incondicionalmente con sus créditos ha venido mejorando su vivienda con el propósito de obtener mejor seguridad y comodidad. Esta vez desea hacer un anexo en su cuarto comprando laminas de zinc, perlines, bloques, arena, cemento, hierro para empezar la obra.
texts.en: María is 56 years old. Her youngest son, 14 years old, lives with her and she is providing for his schooling. She works as a domestic worker and gives the best she is able to her other children, who are of legal age. Through her hard work, and as a single mother, she helped them to become independent people who support her unconditionally. Through her loans, she has been improving her house, with the goal of achieving improved security and comfort. This time she would like to build an annex to her room, buying zinc roofing, steel channel u-bars, cement blocks, sand, cement, and rebar to start the work.

loans.use: to buy zinc roofing, steel channel u-bars, cement blocks, sand, cement, and rebar.

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es: Don Juan sigue adelante siempre con su trabajo como guarda de seguridad por turnos variados lo que hace para apoyarse económicamente tiene su pequeño negocio de pulpería que la administra su esposa lo cual inicio con ahorros y préstamos con Afodenic, con estos ingresos le es posible cubrir los gastos de colegio de su hijo de 12 años. El  crédito solicitado en esta ocasión lo necesita para hacer el muro de la parte trasera de su casa comprara piedra cantera, hierro, cemento, arena, piedrín, bloques esto será posible gracias al apoyo de financiamiento por lo que espera seguir contando con el apoyo de crédito para mejorar el nivel de vida poco a poco.
texts.en: Don Juan continues his job as a security guard, working on different shifts in order to financially support himself. He owns a small grocery store managed by his wife, an activity they have started thanks to their savings and to loans form Afodenic. Thanks to his earnings he is able to pay for his 12-year-old son’s school fees. The loan he is currently requesting will be used to have a wall built at the back of his house. He will buy quarry stones, iron, cement, sand, piedrín (a type of building stone) and blocks thanks to the financial support he hopes to continue receiving through the loan, as this will help him succeed in improving his standard of living one step at the time.

loans.use: To buy quarry stones, iron, cement, sand, piedrín and blocks

loans.name: Xiomara Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Xiomara siempre se apoya con su compañero de vida quien trabaja como jardinero le ayuda en los gastos del hogar y ha logrado  mantener a sus  5 hijos brindándoles estudios y otros gastos básicos todo lo que cabe dentro de sus posibilidades lo que ha hecho posible su venta de ropa por lo que ella no descuida este medio de ingresos tan importante, es por esta razón que solicita un onceavo crédito para invertir comprando variedades de camisas pantalones, ropas de bebes y utensilios para el hogar de esa manera mantener la clientela y poder trabajar gracias al apoyo de financiamiento.
texts.en: Xiomara can always count on her husband’s support: he is a gardener and he helps her paying for their family’s expenses, and they have succeeded in providing for their 5 children granting them and education and providing them with basic needs. These achievements have been reached thanks to their clothes selling activity, and for this reason she does not neglect this earning activity that is so important for them. This is why she has requested her eleventh credit to invest it in the purchase of different types of shirts, trousers, infants’ clothes and home utensils. She hopes to keep her customers and to succeed in working thanks to this loan.

loans.use: To buy  shirts, trousers, infants’ clothes and home utensils.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
La señora María está realizando su primer crédito en el banco comunal El Crédito al cual fue invitada por su suegra. Vive por un hermoso sector de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad  es reconocida por sus 4 ríos, su centro colonial es una mezcla de lo natural y lo moderno, su gente es tradicionalista ya que mantienen viva su cultura, son personas amables, gentiles y cálidas que laboran a diario para mejorar su estabilidad económica y la de sus familias.

La señora. María tiene 21 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido una hija de 4 años de edad. Su esposo es chofer profesional y labora prestando sus servicios conduciendo un taxi, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de un familiar.

Doña María se dedica a la venta por catálogos de una gran variedad de cosméticos y ropa, tiene este negocio desde hace 4 años y trabaja de domingo a domingo. Por las noches está estudiando en el colegio. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos y ropa. 

Su meta es de acabar la secundaria y realizas sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
María is requesting her first loan with El Credito (The Loan), the Communal Bank she has been invited to by her mother-in-law. She lives in a nice area of Cuenca, a town renown for her 4 rivers and for its city center, where colonial, natural and modern elements blend in. Its inhabitants keep their traditional culture alive, and they are kind, gentle and welcoming people who work on a daily basis to improve their economic situation as well as that of their families.

María is 21 years old, she is married and she has a 4-year-old daughter. Her husband works as a taxi driver, and they live in the house of a relative because they do not have a house of their own.

María sells a great variety of cosmetics and clothes by catalogue, an activity she has been engaged in for 4 years working Sundays to Sundays, and she goes to school at night.

She will invest her new loan in the purchase of cosmetics and clothes.

Her goals are to complete secondary education and to attend university.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics and clothes.

loans.name: Rosa Narcisa

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa forma parte del banco comunal El Crédito hace algunos años tiempo en el que ha fortalecidos su amistad con sus vecinas y amigas. Vive por un hermoso sector de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad que es reconocida por sus 4 ríos, su centro colonial es una mezcla de lo natural y lo moderno, su gente es tradicionalista ya que mantienen viva su cultura, son personas amables, gentiles y cálidas que laboran a diario para mejorar su estabilidad económica y  de sus familias.

La Señora. Rosa tiene 40 añosa, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 23, 17, 16 y 10 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado y vive independiente, sus dos siguientes hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad y su ultima hija estudia en una escuelita. Su esposo es un profesional del volante por lo que labora prestando sus servicios como chofer de un taxi que es propio, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de un familiar.

Doña Rosa se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos actividad que la desempeña hace varios años, este negocio le permite mejorar la estabilidad económica de su hogar y sacar adelante a su familia.
 
Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de cosméticos de los cuales ha obtenido muy buenas ganancias con las que ha podido solventar muchos gastos de su hogar, en los pagos de dicho crédito no ha tenido ningún problema. Este nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa y cosméticos para aumentar su mercadería.
texts.en:
Rosa has been a member of the El Credito (The Loan) Communal Bank for a few years, strengthening her friendship with her neighbors and friends in the course of the years. She lives in a nice area of Cuenca, a town renown for her 4 rivers and for its city center, where colonial, natural and modern elements blend in. Its inhabitants keep their traditional culture alive, and they are kind, gentle and welcoming people who work on a daily basis to improve their economic situation as well as that of their families.

Rosa is 40 years old, she is married and she has 4 children aged 23, 17, 16 and 10. Her eldest son is married and lives independently, the other two boys are studying in one of the schools of the city and her youngest daughter attends a small school. Her husband is a professional driver and he offers taxi services with his own vehicle. They live in the house of a relative because they do not have a house of their own.

Rosa has been engaging in selling clothes and cosmetics for a few years. This activity helps her improving her household’s economic situation and providing for her family.

She invested her previous loan in the purchase of cosmetics, going a very goof income she has used to pay for many household expenses, and she has had no problems in repaying said loan. The new loan she is requesting will be used to buy clothes and cosmetics to increase the number of her products.

loans.use: To buy clothes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Mercedes Cresencia

texts.es: Mercedes de 32 Años vive con su esposo y sus hijos en casa humilde pero propia. Es una buena mujer que su mayor ilusión ha sido entregarlo todo por sus hijos y que estos el día de mañana e agradezcan su amor y sacrificio, es muy amable, honesta, y trabajadora con lo que mas le gusta hacer es muy conocida por trabajadora por sus vecinos cercanos. Gracias a Dios Mercedes es una mujer con muchas capacidades las cuales la hacen ver como una gran mujer actualmente posee un pequeño terreno donde siembra insumos básicos y luego los dispone a la venta lastimosamente por el tiempo que esta pasando en nuestro país ha tenido bajas en la cosecha y necesita los insumos para regenerar las mismas, es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un  crédito y así comprar insumos básicos como : semillas, fertilizantes, pesticidas, abonos entre otros. Espera que pronto su ayuda tenga respuesta y agradece a DIOS todo poderoso por gran bendición que recibirá.
texts.en: Mercedes is 32 years old, she lives with her husband and their children in a humble house of their own. She is a good woman whose biggest desire has always been to give everything to her children so that in the future the will be grate to her for her love and sacrifices. She is honest, kind and hardworking, qualities also acknowledged by her neighbors. Mercedes gives thanks to God for being a woman of many talents, as these make her a good woman. She owns a small plot of land where she plants basics products that she then sells. Unfortunately, however, her harvest has been poor due to the bad weather conditions our country has suffered, and she needs supplies to regenerate her harvest. For this reason she has come to INTEGRAL to request a loan that she will use to buy basic supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and manure among other items. She hopes to receive your support soon and she gives thanks to God for the benefits she will receive.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and manure.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулнора замужем и мать двоих детей. Ей 43 года. Ее муж работает сантехником. Гулнора со своей семьей живет в городе Кургантюбе. Она трудолюбивая и ответственная женщина. Гулнора уже 5 лет занимается торговлей. Она продает на рынке своего города различные виды овощи (свекла, репа, чеснок и т.д.). Чтобы увеличить товарооборот Гулнора берет кредит для приобретенеия ассортимента товара (овощей).
texts.en:
Gulnora is married, and the mother of two children. She is 43 years old. Her husband works as a plumber. Gulnora lives in Qurgan-Tube with her family. She is a hardworking and responsible woman. 

Gulnora has worked with sales for 5 years. She sells various types of vegetables (beets, turnips, garlic and so on) at the market in town. In order to increase the turnover, Gulnora takes a loan for the purchase of an assortment of products (vegetables).

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of products (vegetables) with an aim to increase turnover

loans.name: Miratali

texts.ru:
Миратали житель Яванского района. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Его сын находится на заработках за рубежом. Миратали очень ответственный и хозяйственный мужчина.
Миратали при доме имеет орошаемый земельный участок, где выращивает овощи и пшеницу. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже восемь лет. Миратали берет кредит для посева картошки, лука и пшеницы. Он хочет посеять и получить хороший урожай. Миратали намерен расширить жилплощадь, построить дом.
texts.en: Miratali lives in the Yavan region.  He is 43 years old and he is married with six children.  His son is working abroad.  Miratali is a very responsible and frugal man.  Next to his home, he has an irrigable plot of land, where he grows vegetables and wheat.  He has been in this line of work for eight years.  Miratali is asking for a loan to sow potatoes, onions and wheat.  He wants to sow and reap a good harvest.  He intends to expand his living space, and to build a home.

loans.use: to sow potatoes, onions and wheat so as to receive a good income and build a home.

loans.name: Mahmadali

texts.ru: Махмадали берет очередной кредит для посева саженцев. Он в основном занимается выращиванием бахчевых культур и овощей. Также Махмадали занимается садоводством. Он берет кредит для приобретения саженцев, чтобы посадить фруктовые деревья на новой земле.
texts.en:
Mahmadali takes another loan for planting seedlings. He mainly works with growing melons and vegetables. He also works with gardening.

He takes a loan for the purchase of seedlings, in order to plant fruit trees on new land.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings in order to plant trees on purchased land

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru:
Дилафруз жительница города Вахдат. Ей 41 год. Она замужняя женщина. У нее двое детей. Дилафруз очень жизнерадостная и дружелюбная. Ее муж работает строительными работами и разнорабочим по найму. 
Дилафруз вот уже три года как занимается шитьем. Она портниха. Дилафруз работает в ателье. На сегодняшний день она арендует швейную машинку на рабочем месте. 
Дилафруз берет кредит для приобретения швейных машинок. Один она берет для рабочего места, а другой для дома, чтобы продолжит свою работу дома. Она заранее благодарит тех кто ее поддержат!
texts.en:
Dilafruz is a resident of the city of Vahdat. She is 41 years old. She is a married woman with two children. Dilafruz is very cheerful and friendly. Her husband does construction work and a handyman for hire. 

Dilafruz has been working with sewing for three years already. She is a seamstress, and works in a studio. Today she rents a sewing machine at her working place. Dilafruz takes a loan for the purchase sewing machines - one for her work place and one for her home, in order to continue her work there. She thanks all those who support her in advance.

loans.use: to purchase sewing machines, in order to work on her own, private machines

loans.name: Sherali

texts.ru: Шерали житель горда Вахдат. Ему 52 года. Он женат. Шерали живет с женой. У него пятеро детей. Шерали вместе с женой занимается торговлей. Он печет и продает свежую самбусу. Этим видом деятельности Шерали занимается пять лет. Он берет кредит для покупки дров, угля, несколько мешков лука и приобретения необходимой посуды.
texts.en:
Sherali is a resident of the city of Vahdat. He is 52 years old and married. Sherali lives with his wife. They have five children. 

Together with his wife, Sherali works with sales. He bakes and sells fresh sambusa. Sherali has worked with this type of activity for five years. He takes a loan for the purchase of wood, coal, several bags of onions and necessary utensils.

loans.use: to purchase wood, coal, several bags of onions and necessary utensils

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr: Abdoulaye est un homme marié, père de six enfants dont les trois fréquentent l'école.Il pratique l'agriculture et l'élevage notamment l'embouche bovine.Il achète des bœufs qu'il engraisse et revend au bout de six mois. Cette activité lui rapporte des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses propres besoins et à ceux de sa famille. Il sollicite un pret de 500 000f pour acheter un bœuf.
texts.en: Abdoulaye is a married man and the father of 6 children, 3 of whom attend school. He farms and raises livestock, namely practising cattle fattening. He buys cattle which he fattens and resells after 6 months. This business earns him revenues which allow him to meet his needs and those of his family. He is requesting a loan of 500 000 francs with which to buy an ox.

loans.use: to buy an ox.

loans.name: Diamaguene Group

texts.fr: "DIAMAGUENE" est un groupe de solidarité composé de six femmes, toutes mariées.Elles pratiquent l'activité d'embouche ovine en achetant chaque année des moutons qu'elles engraissent puis revendent. Ce qui leur rapporte des revenus assez consistants leur permettant de prendre en charge leurs propres besoins ainsi que ceux de leurs familles. Le chef de groupe ( en tee- shirt jaune, tenant le mouton) est mère de quatre enfants. Elle aide son mari à supporter les dépenses d'entretien de leurs enfants. Le groupe sollicite un pret de 500 000f pour acheter des moutons.
texts.en: Diamaguene is a solidarity group which is made up of 6 woman who are all married. They practise sheep fattening and, each year, buy sheep which they fatten and resell. This earns them quite a consistent income which allows them to take care of their own needs as well as those of their families. The group leader (wearing a yellow t-shirt and holding the sheep) is the mother of 4 children. She supports her husband with their children's living expenses. The group is requesting a loan of 500 000 francs with which to buy sheep.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Cécile Rama

texts.fr: Cécile est une femme mariée qui exerce l'activité d'embouche ovine.Elle achète des moutons qu'elle engraisse puis les revend.Elle parvient à obtenir des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses propres besoins mais aussi de participer à la prise des charge des dépenses d'entretien de la famille.Sur la photo, elle tient la fiche de contrat pour le pret à l'UIMCEC.Elle sollicite un pret de 200 000f pour acheter des moutons.
texts.en: Cecile is a married woman who raises sheep.  She buys her sheep, fattens them up, then resells them.   She manages to make enough income to meet her needs and also to contribute to the daily responsibilities of the family.  In the picture, she is holding the contract for the l'UIMCEC loan.  She is requesting a loan of 200,000f to buy sheep.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Marie

texts.fr: Marie est une femme mariée, mère de trois enfants.Elle exerce une activité de commerce.Achète en gros des produits cosmétiques dans la capitale à des prix abordables et les revend au détails dans les marchés de sa localité.Sur la photo, elle se trouve ici dans le guichet de l'UIMECEC. Ce commerce lui rapporte des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses propres besoins ainsi qu'à ceux de sa famille.Elle sollicite un pret de 200 000f pour acheter des caisses de produits cosmétiques.
texts.en: Marie is a married woman and the mother of 3 children. She is a retailer; she buys cosmetic products wholesale in the capital for affordable prices, and resells them at her local markets to retail customers. In the photograph, she is in a UIMCEC branch. Her business generates an income which allows her to meet her own needs as well as those of her family. She is requesting a loan of 200 000 francs with which to buy some boxes of cosmetic products.

loans.use: to buy boxes of cosmetics.

loans.name: Muhabat

texts.ru:
Мухабат жительница города Исфара. Ей 60 лет. Она разведена. У нее большая семья, Мухабат является матерью пятерых детей. Ее сыновья находятся на заработках за рубежом. Сама Мухабат имеет среднее образование. Она четыре года проработала продавщицей. Сейчас Мухабат занимается купле - продажей сухофруктов.
Мухабат берет кредит для покупки сухофруктов, чтобы расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en:
Muhabat is a resident of the city of Isfara. She is 60 years old, and divorced. She has a large family; she is the mother of five children. Her sons are migrant workers abroad. 

Muhabat has secondary education. She has worked as a saleswoman for four years. Currently Muhabat works with buying and reselling dried fruits. Muhabat takes a loan for the purchase of dried fruits, in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase dried apricots and apples in order to expand her business

loans.name: Dilovar

texts.ru:
Диловар житель города Исфара. Ему 27 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Диловар предоставляет услугу. Он арендует помещение, где открыл студию звукозаписи. Диловар разбирается в музыке. Вот уже десять лет он в этой области. Диловар очень рад, что он открыл свою студию. 
Диловар берет кредит для приобретения необходимых музыкальных инструментов. Он очень признателен тем, кто его поддержат.
texts.en:
Dilovar is a resident of the city of Isfara. He is 27 years old and married. He has two children. Dilovar provides a service. He rents premises where he has opened a recording studio. Dilovar understands music. He has been in this area for more than ten years. 

Dilovar is very happy that he opened his studio. He takes a loan for the purchase of necessary musical instruments. He is very grateful to those that help him.

loans.use: to purchase necessary musical instruments, in order to expand his business even more

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds of okra, eggplant, cabbage, and onions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients such as onions, oil, pepper, garlic, chilies, meat, and fish for her restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blades and spare parts for resale.

loans.name: Boubacar

texts.fr:
Monsieur Boubacar est gérant d’une coopérative agricole, il travaille de 8h à 18h. Il est marié et père de famille. Actuellement, il vit en grande famille avec ses parents, ses frères et sœurs, sa femme et ses enfants. Ce qui est une situation embarrassante dès fois c’est pourquoi, il se tourne vers IMCEC pour bénéficier d’un crédit qui lui permettra d’avancer dans ses travaux de construction.
Mettre sa petite famille dans de meilleures conditions de vie, là est son souci majeur.
texts.en: Mr. Boubacar is the manager of a farm cooperative. He works from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. He is married and a father with a family. He currently lives in a large family with his parents, brothers, sisters, his wife, and his children. This is an embarrassing situation at times, so he has turned toward IMCEC to obtain a loan enabling him to continue with construction work [on his house]. Providing the best living conditions for his small family is his main concern.

loans.use: to build a house on a parcel of land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to finish building her house

loans.name: Abou

texts.fr:
Monsieur Abou, marié est père de famille et vit dans un petit village situé non loin de la ville principale. Abou est boulanger de profession et a acquis une expérience de plus de 20 ans dans ce domaine. Il sollicite un crédit de 500.000F CFA afin de pouvoir faire face aux charges salariales de sa boulangerie qui se trouve dans la capitale. Il gère la dépense quotidienne de son foyer et paie aussi les frais de scolarité de ses enfants grâce au crédit. 
Comme projet futur, il aimerait à la suite de cela, renforcer sa boutique d’alimentation sise à la ville.
texts.en:
Mr. Abou, a married father with a family, lives in a small village located near a major city. Mr. Abou is a baker by trade and has acquired over twenty years of experience in this domain. He is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs CFA to cope with the salary expenses associated with his bakery, which is found in the capital. Thanks to loans, he manages the day-to-day household expenses and also pays his children's schooling costs.

For the future, he would next like to bolster his grocery store located in the city.

loans.use: to pay the salaries related to operating his bakery

loans.name: Marademe Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  Marademe  est constitué de 5 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 36 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent  majoritairement dans des  familles traditionnelles à Méridièla, un des villages du cercle de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Afin de  renforcer leurs capacités financières pour de mieux faire leurs commerces, elles ont adhérés à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur neuvième  prêt. Les  précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de céréales,  de beignets et la prépararion et vente de viandes.
Fanta  debout au milieu de la retauaration avec la préparation vente de viandes. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 5 petits ruminants (chèvres) auprès de paysans. Elle effectue ses ventes de viandes cuites(vinade grillée et en ragout) au marché de Méridièla, dans les foires des villages environnants  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 60.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Marademe group is made up of 5 women who are all married and have an average age of 36 and, on average, 3 children. They mostly live in traditional families in Méridièla, one of the villages in the Bougouni Circle. They got to know each other thanks to neighbourly and professional relationships, and friendships. They joined the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution in order to strengthen their financial capacity so that they could better run their businesses, and are on their 9th loan. The previous loans have been properly reimbursed. This group of women sells cereals and doughnuts, and prepares and sells meat.

Fanta, who is standing in the middle of the picture, buys and sells meats. She plans to use her loan to buy 5 small goats from the farmers. She makes her sales of cooked meat (grilled and stewed) at the Méridièla market, at the markets of the surrounding villages and door-to-door, for cash or credit to a retail clientèle made up of men and women. She expects to make an average monthly profit of 60 000 francs, which will be reinvested in her business and used to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy small goats

loans.name: Llinset Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Llinset es una clienta casada, su esposo trabaja como contador para una empresa quien le ayuda en los gastos, ella tiene 3 hijos jóvenes dos estudiantes de la universidad  y uno de secundaria por lo que la señora cuida mucho su trabajo en una distribuidora como responsable de ventas desde hace 15 años porque su prioridad es darles la educación a sus hijos y con este empleo ha sido posible el seguir adelante con la familia. Está solicitando el séptimo crédito para la darle fino a la pared interna y puesta de piso en su casa, por lo que necesita comprar cemento, arena, cerámica, ella agradece mucho a Kiva y Afodenic por apoyarla con sus pequeños proyectos.
texts.en:
Llinset is married with three children, two of whom are in college and one of whom is in high school. She helps her husband – who works as an accountant for a company – with expenses. She says that her children are the reason she has worked so hard for 15 years as the sales manager for a distributor. Her priority is to give her children an education, and with her job she has been able to help her family to get ahead. She is requesting her seventh loan to buy the cement, sand and ceramic tile she needs to finish an interior wall and install a floor in her home. 

She is very grateful to Kiva and AFODENIC for helping her with her small building projects.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and ceramic tiles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase brooms, palm oil, and dried and smoked fish to resell

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr: Mademoiselle  Aminata vit au Sénégal. Elle est célibataire et évolue dans le secteur commercial depuis plus de 03 ans. Sa spécialité dans ce secteur est la vente de tissus.  Elle est membre au niveau de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC où elle sollicite un prêt d’un montant de 200.000 francs CFA prévu pour acheter des  tissus a revendre. Ce premier crédit lui permettra de solidifier son activité commerciale en renforçant  l’offre de produits qu’elle propose a sa clientèle et en même temps d’accroitre son chiffre d’affaire. Elle souhaite développer davantage son commerce afin de réaliser son rêve de devenir une grande importatrice de conteneurs de tissus.
texts.en: Ms. Aminata lives in Senegal. She is unmarried and has been working in the commercial sector for over thirty years. Her specialty is this sector is selling cloth. She is a member of a U-IMCEC branch where she is requesting a loan in the amount of 200,000 francs CFA for purchasing some cloth to resell. This initial loan will enable her to solidify her business by bolstering the products she offers to her customers, and at the same time, by increasing her sales. She would like to  develop her business further in order to realize her dream of becoming a major importer of transportainers of cloth.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to resell

loans.name: José Guillermo

texts.es:
José, de 37 años de edad es un campesino que se ha dedicado a la actividad agropecuaria desde su juventud. Aprendió el oficio gracias a sus padres quienes residieron en el campo toda la vida. 
Desde sus catorce años  cultiva café, el cual es uno de los productos más comercializados en su región. Su mayor reto ha sido luchar contra la crisis cafetera, la inestabilidad de los precios y las pestes que invaden constantemente sus cultivos.
Su mayor sueño es poder ofrecerles a sus hijas de doce y catorce años de edad  una buena educación, por lo cual considera la posibilidad de radicarlas en la ciudad, ya que la escuela de la vereda es muy retirada de la finca.
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes con el propósito se sacar un buena cosecha y pagarle a los dos empleados que le colaboran con las labores agropecuarias.
Espera poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José, 37, is a farmworker who has made a living in agriculture since his youth.  He learned the work thanks to his parents, who lived in the country all their lives.

He has grown coffee, one of the most marketed crops in the region, since he was 14 years old.  His biggest challenge has been struggling against the coffee crisis, price instability, and pests that constantly invade his crops. 

His biggest dream is to be able to give his children, ages 12 and 14, a good education, for which he's considering the possibility of relocating them to the city because the area school is very far from the farm.

He's requesting a loan to invest in buying fertilizer with the goal of getting a good harvest and paying his two employees who help him with the farming labor.

He hopes to be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Augusto Cesar

texts.es: Don Augusto siempre con su labor de seguridad la esposo es ama de casa vela por el orden del hogar.
