His expectation is the continue expanding his business. He is asking for financing to buy CDs, controls, and wires. He appreciates that this loan will help him to buy more merchandise to satisfy the needs of his clients. With the goal of improving sales every day, his future

loans.use: to buy CDs, controls, and wires.

loans.name: Vilma Elena

texts.es:
La señora Vilma Elena esta casad, tiene 24 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijos quie esta estudiando la educación primaria, se dedica a la tejeduría de fajas típicos, trabajo que inicio siendo operaria y hasta el momento lleva 2 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la confección .

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de hilos, para tricotado y luego ser utilizado para el tejido de mas fajas de varios diseños, ya que quiere mejorar su negocio y tener mas posibilidades de venta, tratando de colocar su productos en el mercado.
texts.en:
Vilma Elena is married, 24 years old and went to three years of elementary school. She has one child who is in elementary school. She makes a living weaving traditional belts. She began this work herself and at the moment now has two years of experience. She relies on the support of her husband who makes a living making clothing. 

She is requesting a loan to help her buy thread for knitting and then be used for the weaves of more belts with varied designs. She is doing this because she wants to improve her business and have greater sales opportunities to bring her products into the market.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Tojiniso

texts.ru: Точинисо 48 лет. Она со своей семьей проживает в районе Хуросон. Ее муж в данное время находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Точинисо добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она наравне с мужем обеспечивает семью. Точинисо уже 10 лет как занимается животноводством. Она покупает коров и телят, откармливает их несколько месяцев и затем продает на скотном рынке своего района. Сейчас Точинисо берет кредит для купли и продажи крупно-рогатого скота с целью расширения своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Tojiniso is 48 years old and lives with her family in the Khuroson region. Her husband is currently earning a living as a migrant worker in the Russian Federation. She is a kind and hard-working woman who makes an equal contribution with her husband to providing for the family. For 10 years now, she has been working in animal husbandry. She buys cows and calves, fattens them, then sells them at the cattle market. Tojiniso is now seeking a loan to buy and sell cattle so that she can expand her business.

loans.use: to buy and sell cattle

loans.name: Zareena

texts.en:
Ms Zareena is a 35-year-old vigorous lady. She has been stitching clothes for the past 3 years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. 

Due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet with the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons as a means of increasing revenues so she may able to generate a healthier source of income. 

She is thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Ms Parveen is a 52-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. She has been in the business of tailoring for 14 years to support her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of the household and the educational needs of their children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well.
 
Together with her husband, she manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she requested a loan of Rs. 30000 to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons, and lace. With this, she will be able to meet with the increasing demand. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

She is in her 2nd loan cycle with good repayment history. Parveen hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons, and lace.

loans.name: Santa Rosa De Lima Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Santa Rosa de Lima

Silvia pertenece al grupo desde sus inicios, ingreso a él invitada por una amiga. Silvia tiene 31 años es soltera y vive con su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de lencería y ropa interior, las personas que le compran son en su mayoría mujeres, entre las que están sus vecinas, amigas y  personas que se recomiendan entre sí. Silvia se siente feliz con su negocio porque le permite tener  independencia económica y  apoyar a su familia, su nuevo crédito le servirá para comprar más ropa, sobretodo nuevos modelos que sus clientas le han solicitado, en el futuro le gustaría abrir una tienda en un lugar estratégico donde acuda mucha gente a comprarle. ¡Silvia le agradece su apoyo! 
Silvia es la segunda de la izquierda, está sentada viste pantalón jean y polo crema.
texts.en:
Greetings from Perú! This is the "Santa Rosa de Lima" group.

Silvia has been a part of this group since the beginning; she entered upon invitation from a friend. Silvia is 31 years old, single and lives with her family. She makes a living selling lingerie and underwear. The majority of her customers are women, mainly neighbors, friends and those who have been recommended to her by others. 

Silvia is happy with her business because it allows her to be economically independent and support her family. Her new loan will allow her to buy more clothing, above all new styles that her customers have requested. In the future she would like to open a store in a strategic location where many people would come to buy from her. Silivia is thankful for your support! 

Silvia is the second from the left. She is seated, dressed in jeans and a cream colored top.

loans.use: to buy clothing for her business.

loans.name: Kubra

texts.en:
Ms Kubra is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. She has been running a business of trading clothes for the past 8 years. She purchases a variety of clothes from the main city and then sells them to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality clothes in her community. 

Kubra requested a loan of 35,000 PKR from Kashf Foundation to buy stocks of different clothes for the summer season, taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through greater sales. 

She is in her fourth loan cycle with good repayment history. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of different clothes for her customers for the summer season.

loans.name: Muqadas

texts.en:
Ms Muqadas is a 35-year-old married woman with a business of selling milk for the past 20 years. She has 5 calves and 2 cows to milk. She sells their milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to lead a decent life.

She has five children who are school-going. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food, and clothing. She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. 

It’s her eleventh year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through its support. Now she requested a loan of Rs 50,000 to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. She hopes to have increase in her production capacity, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en: Nazia is a 31 year old married woman and the mother of two children. For the past three years, she has been running a hand-embroidery business. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy more spools of thread in different colors with packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment. With this she will be able to cater more customers consistently. She hopes to increase in her income by targeting more customers. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with a good repayment history. Nazia dreams of a bright future for her children, and is very much thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors, as well as packs of beads, sequins and stones

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en:
Balqees is a vigorous 56 year old married woman. She has had a hand-embroidery business for many years. She is passionate about her work, and client demand is strong. But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. Balqees’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best earning resource in her household. 

Balqees is a mother of five children. She wants to grow her business so she has requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy raw materials such as threads, sequins and pearls in large quantities so she can meet the increasing demand of her customers. She dreams of running a training center for the girls of her village. She would teach them embroidery skills, and they can help her expand her business, and also earn money for themselves. She is also interested in opening her own shop in the market to display her work.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as threads, sequins and pearls in large quantities

loans.name: Mariana De Jesus

texts.es:
La Sra. Mariana  vive en Libertad, tiene 42 años de edad. Es una mujer soltera, no tiene hijos a quien mantener. Su negocio lo comenzó con una pequeña tienda con productos de primera necesidad la ha tenido toda su vida, aparte se compró una camioneta y la tiene trabajando vendiendo arroz y legumbres.

Este negocio lo realiza con su papá  todo el día, ella  ha luchado junto a su papá por tener un mejor vivir.  Las dificultades que tiene es la  enfermedad que tiene su papá aunque él la acompaña a todos lados a entregar la mercadería  y a cobrar. Lo único que ella desea es que su papá se mejore ya que él es la fuente para que ella siga luchando.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar legumbres, viveres de primera necesidad, arroz para seguir vendiendo. En el futuro desea tener un local grande como un Minimarket para generar mayores ganancias y así poder seguir un tratamiento al papá.
texts.en:
Mariana, 42, lives in Libertad.  She’s single and has no children to support.  She started her business with a small basic staples store she’s had her entire life; she also bought a pick-up truck she uses to sell rice and vegetables.  

She works in the business every day with her father.  She and her father have struggled to live better.  The difficulty she faces is her father’s illness despite which he goes everywhere with her to deliver merchandise and to collect payment.  The only thing she wants is that her father gets better since he’s the reason for her to continue striving.

She wants to use the loan to buy vegetables, basic food items and rice to continue selling.  In future, she’d like to have a large space like a minimarket to generate higher income and be able to continue with her father’s treatment.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Panji

texts.ru: Панжи 28 - летний женатый молодой человек проживающий в районе Шахритус. Он является отцом двоих детей. Панжи занимается растениеводством. Он в основном занимается выращиванием овощей и бахчевых культур. В этой области он три года. Панжи берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений и топлива, чтобы посеять арбуз и дыню.
texts.en: Panji is a young 28-year-old married man who lives in the Shahrituz region. He is the father of 2 children. He grows crops for a living, mainly vegetables and melons. He has been doing this for the past 3 years. Panji is now seeking a loan to buy mineral fertilizers and fuel so he can plant melons and watermelons.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer and fuel so he can plant melons and watermelons

loans.name: Norteia

texts.en:
A $1000 loan will help Norteia to improve her business. She has a shop where many people come to buy every day. She will use the loan buy some additional stock, such as children's clothing, shirts and jeans. She has been involved in business activities since 2009. She feels comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Norteia independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy children's clothing ,shirts and jeans.

loans.name: Tet's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Kandal province, Tet is 29 years old and married. He has three little children who are too young for schooling. 

To support the daily cost of living, he grows rice on 1.5 hectares of land and makes good use of his free time by growing ginger for extra income. The current business that he has been involved in for ten years earns him about KHR 11,100 per day. 

Tet is a first-time borrower with VisionFund Cambodia (Kiva’s partner). He now forms a group of two, to apply for a new loan in amount of KHR 1,000,000 each. 

Tet will use his loan portion to buy good ginger seedlings and to pay for plowing fees in order to be ready for planting. He hopes to gain more yield from his ginger and to sell it for a high price, so he can set aside some money in order to send all of his children to school.

loans.use: to buy good ginger seedlings and to pay for plowing fees.

loans.name: Constance

texts.en:
Constance is single and has two children.  She lives in Kiniogo, Mutojo in rural Ntungamo. The father does not give them any kind of financial assistance. She earns an income from growing tomatoes, which she sells to business people, and from a piggery. 

Constance is requesting a loan for 500,000 UGX, which she will use to pay school fees to enable her children to return to school. She will use proceeds from the piggery and tomato sales to repay the loan. She is a hard working and resilient woman.

loans.use: to pay tuition for her children.

loans.name: Lutiana Argentina

texts.es:
Lutiana vive en Guayaquil,ella empezo su negocio trabajando para otra persona luego reunio su capital y empezo a trabajar con su propio capital en venta de cosmeticos. Ella actualmente solo trabaja 3 horas diarias promocionando sus productos .

Le dificulta las enfermedades , es soltera pero tiene hijos mayores de edad. Con el prestamop quiere comprar perfumes que los comprar a $ 18.00, cremas que comprar a $ 9.00 y  maquillajes que comprar a $ 15.00. Comprando estos productos le permitiran tener un buen inventario y mejorar sus ventas. Su sueño y aspiraciones es darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Lutiana lives in Guayaquil.  She started her business working for another person until she saved up capital and started to work on her own selling cosmetics.  She currently works just three hours daily promoting her products.

Her difficulty is illnesses.  She’s single but has adult children.  She wants to use the loan to buy perfume that costs her $18.00, creams she buys for $9.00 and make-up she buys for $15.00.  Buying these products will make it possible for her to have a good inventory on hand and to improve her sales.  Her dream and hope is to give her family the best.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is 55 years old and married. She has four children, one of whom is in school.

Chona is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Chona has been pig fattening for 12 years now and has borrowed 18 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Chona would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Normat

texts.ru: Нормат житель города Турсунзаде. Ему 54 года. Он женат и отец четверых детей. Нормат является опытным дехканином. Он уже 25 лет как занимается земледелием. У него 0,20га орошаемой земли, где он выращивает такие виды овощей, как помидоры, огурцы, чеснок и т.д. Одновременно Нормат работает мастером по ремонту домов. Так как сейчас сезон посева Нормат запрашивает кредит для приобретения семян огурцов, помидора и чеснока. За счет прибыли с урожая Нормат планирует расширить свою земледельческую деятельность.
texts.en: Normat lives in the city of Tursun-zoda. He is 54 years old, married, and has 4 children. He is an experienced farmer. For the last 25 years, he has been growing crops for a living. He has a 0.2 hectare plot of land where he grows such vegetables as tomatoes, cucumbers, garlic, and so on. At the same time, he has also worked doing home repairs. Because it is now planting season, Normat is seeking a loan to buy cucumber, tomato, and garlic seeds. He plans to use the income generated by the loan to expand his farming business.

loans.use: to buy cucumber, tomato and garlic seeds

loans.name: Salohiddin

texts.ru: Салохиддину 63 года. Он проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Салохиддин женат и имеет шестеро детей. Салохиддин является опытным скотоводом. В течение 25 лет он занимается животноводством. Он покупает крупно-рогатый скот, откармливает и перепродает с наценкой. Так как сейчас Салохиддин вышел на пенсию, он хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота. Он запрашивает кредит для закупа скота с целью расширения своей животноводческой деятельности.
texts.en: Salohiddin lives in the city of Tursun-zoda. He is 63 years old, married, and has 6 children. He is an experienced stockman, and for the last 25 years he has been involved in animal husbandry. He buys cattle, fattens them, then sells them for a profit. As he is now on a pension, he wants to increase his herd. Salohiddin is seeking a loan to buy cattle for the purpose of expanding his animal husbandry business.

loans.use: to buy cattle for the purpose of expanding his animal husbandry business

loans.name: Ruziboy

texts.ru:
Рузибой житель района Шахритус. Ему 24 года. Он холост. Рузибой живет с родителями. Мать Рузибоя домохозяйка. Рузибой имеет среднее образование. 
Рузибой три года как занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Он арендует земельный участок, где выращивает бахчевые культуры для продажи. Таким образом он зарабатывает и помогает родителям. Рузибой берет кредит для покупки семян, удобрений и топлива, чтобы устроить свою свадьбу.
texts.en:
Ruziboy is an inhabitant of the Shahrituz region. He is 24 years old. He is single. Ruziboy lives with his parents. His mother is a homemaker. Ruziboy has a high school education. 

Ruziboy has been engaged in growing crops for three years. He rents a plot of land where he grows melons to sell. In this way, he earns a living and helps his parents. 

Ruziboy is taking a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and fuel, in order to be able to arrange his wedding.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and fuel, in order to put on his wedding

loans.name: Tukore Group Nyakahiha

texts.en: Alima was so tired of depending on her peasant husband for the livelihood of the family. They constantly argued over small things whenever her husband failed to provide for the family. He eventually left her and she had to struggle single-handedly. However, in one of the village meetings, the chairperson shared with the members about Ugafode Micro finance having approached him to offer financial services to the residents. Alima joined the group and has since never remained the same. She buys goats that she rears and when they have multiplied by giving birth, she can sell some of them off to get income to sustain her family. She now has adequate funds to pay the children's tuition and meet their other necessities like food and medicine.She is so thankful to Ugafode for having come in her time of need. She is confident that she will grow to greater heights with their services.

loans.use: To buy goats

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
This is Elvira, 43, resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Fortunato and a mother to her children. Together with her husband, she manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Elvira operates a food stall. In the Philippines, the whole working community and most of the families eat home-cooked meals only in the evenings, when all of the family members are at home to take part in the meal. This is not only a usual family tradition but a matter of convenience and frugal living. It is considered a waste of money and time to use cooking gas and food for only one to two persons when buying cooked rice and viands costs less than raw food. Elvira's regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan. She will use the loan to buy more quantities of products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.  

Elvira dreams of giving her children a good life and a future. She hopes that her business gets bigger. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken and vegetables and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Mavlakat

texts.ru: Мавлакат жительница района Шахритус. Ей 52 года. Она замужем. У нее шестеро детей. Двое ее сыновей находятся на заработках за рубежом. Мавлакат имеет среднее образование. Она четыре года занимается животноводством. Мавлакат в основном разводит мелко - рогатый и крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Она берет кредит для закупа коров, бычков и телят, чтобы увеличить поголовья крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en:
Mavlakat is an inhabitant of the Shahrituz region. She is 52 years old, married, and has six children. Two of her sons are working abroad. Mavlakat has a high school education. For four years, she has been engaged in raising livestock. Mavlakar mostly raises small breeds and horned cattle at her home. 

She is taking a loan to buy cows, bulls, and calves, in order to increase the count of her cattle.

loans.use: to buy cows, bulls and calves, in order to increase the number of cattle

loans.name: Shodman

texts.ru: Шодман житель района Шахритус. Ему 38 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Шодман вместе с семьей занимается растениеводством. Он на протяжении девяти лет выращивает овощи для продажи. Также Шодман занимается животноводством. Он берет кредит для закупа телят и посева овощей, чтобы в будущем провести мероприятия обрезания сыновей.
texts.en:
Shodman is an inhabitant of the Shahrituz region. He is 38 years old, married, and has five children. Shodman and his family are engaged in agriculture. For the past nine years, he has been growing vegetables for sale. Similarly, Shodman has been engaged in raising livestock. 

He is taking a loan to buy cattle and to grow vegetables, in order in the future to host circumcision events for his sons.

loans.use: to purchase cattle, in order to host circumcision events for his sons

loans.name: Bahrom

texts.ru:
Бахром житель района Шахритус. Ему 30 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Жена Бахрома домохозяйка. Образование у Бахрома среднее. 
Бахром на протяжении десяти лет занимается растениеводством. Он арендует участок земли, где выращивает арбуз и дыню для продажи. Бахром берет кредит для приобретения семян картошки и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en:
Bahrom is an inhabitant of the Shahrituz region. He is 30 years old, married, and has two children. Bahrom's wife is a homemaker. He has a high school education. 

For the past ten years, Bahrom has been engaged in agriculture. He rents a plot of land where he grows melons and watermelons for sale. 

Bahrom is taking a loan to acquire seed potatoes and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to grow potatoes

loans.name: Deus

texts.en: Deus is resident of Ndeba. He is 41 years old and married with 6 children, 4 of whom are school-going. He is a second time borrower from UGAFODE Microfinance Ltd. In his first cycle he took UGX 500,000 which he borrowed for 6 months. By then he was dealing in scrap and this loan helped him so much to earn more income and he was able to start up a small retail shop besides the scrap business. Deus says this income has helped him pay school fees for the 4 children, pay rent and also look after his family. He has now taken a loan of UGX 1,000,000 and the purpose is to add more stock in the retail shop business so that he can increase his income. His plan is to see his children finish school and have a bright future. He also wises to borrow more money in order to buy a piece of land and build a home for his children and wife. He thanks the funders for the support they have given low income earners like him. He is so grateful for the support.

loans.use: To buy items for his retail shop

loans.name: Futuro Para El Bien Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Futuro para el Bien

Lucia es una de sus socias. Ella  tiene 53 años es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos. Lucia se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes, diariamente tiene que cuidar su alimentación y limpieza. Son aproximadamente 10 años que se dedica a este negocio gracias a su vecino que le dio la idea, antes se dedicaba a la venta de golosinas pero no le generaba muchas ganancias, así  decidió dejarlo para dedicarse de lleno a la crianza, en la actualidad tiene muchos cuyes y lo comercializa entre sus vecinos, familiares y algunos restaurantes, que le compran semanal y quincenalmente. Con su nuevo crédito podrá arreglar las jaulas de sus cuyes, también podrá comprar  alimentos y medicinas. Lucia  se siente bien porque gracias a su negocio ayuda a sus hijos y está muy agradecida  a los Inversionistas  de  KIVA que hacen posible su crédito y el de su grupo comunal.
 En la foto es la cuarta de la izquierda viste pantalón negro.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!  This is the “Futuro para el Bien” group.

Lucia is one of its members.  She’s 53-years-old, has a spouse and two children.  She works raising and selling guinea pigs.  She has to feed and clean them daily.  She’s been in this business for about 10 years thanks to a neighbor who gave her the idea.  She used to work selling snacks but that wasn’t very profitable so she decided to set it aside and go into raising guinea pigs full-time.  She currently has many guinea pigs that she sells among her neighbors, family members and to some restaurants that buy from her weekly or bi-weekly.

She will use her new loan to repair the guinea pig cages and also to buy feed and medicine.  Lucia feels good because thanks to her business she’s able to help her children.  She’s very grateful to Kiva lenders because they make her and her communal bank’s loan possible.  

In the photo, she’s fourth from the left wearing black pants.

loans.use: to buy feed for her guinea pigs.

loans.name: Hojimurod

texts.ru: Хожимуроду 58 лет. Он со своей семьей проживает в Бохтарском районе. Двое его сыновей в данное время находятся на заработках за пределами страны. Сам Хожимурод занимается животноводством уже 10 лет и является опытным скотоводом. Он покупает бычков, откармливает их несколько месяцев и затем продает с наценкой на скотном рынке. Чтобы расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль, Хожимурод запрашивает кредит для купли и продажи крупно-рогатого скота.
texts.en:
Hojimurod is 58 years old. He and his family reside in the Bohtar region. At this time, two of his sons are working outside the country. Hojimurod himself has been involved in raising livestock for ten years and is an experienced rancher. He buys calves, fattens them for several months, and then sells them at a premium in the cattle market. 

In order to expand his business and to receive a good profit, Hojimurod is requesting a loan for the purchase of cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle with the goal of expanding his business

loans.name: Emprendedores De San Cristobal Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Emprendedores de San Cristóbal” del distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los otros socios se dedican a la venta de productos de belleza, compra y venta de zapatos, tienda de abarrotes, venta de lubricantes, repuestos para computadoras, compra y venta de ropa. 

Nieves es miembro del banco comunal tiene 60 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos, ella nació en el centro poblado de Quincemil pero actualmente vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos para niños, damas y caballeros. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Nieves en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mas mercadería como zapatos escolares pues se está acercando la campaña escolar. 
 
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (La persona que aparece en la parte inferior de la fotografía llego a tarde a la reunión.
texts.en:
The communal bank Emprendedores de San Cristóbal was formed by a group of friends and neighbors from the district of Cusco, in Cusco province, department of Cusco. This communal bank comprises several people who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead and to give their children a better future through their daily effort. 

Nieves is one of this communal bank's members. She is sixty years old, married, and has two children from this beautiful relationship. She was born in the heart of the village of Quincemil, but currently lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. She works selling men, women, and children's shoes. She has been in this business for several years and it is going very well. This time Nieves needs a loan in order to purchase more merchandise - such as school shoes - because the school season is about to begin. 

The other members work selling beauty products, shoes, groceries, lubricants, spare parts for computers, and clothing.

All of the members appreciate the opportunity being offered and promise to timely comply with their different installment payments.

(The person in the lower picture was late for the meeting.)

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise, like school shoes.

loans.name: Simeon

texts.es: Simeón de 43 años , esta casado con Mery de 42 años , con quien tiene 2 hijos .Su actividad principal es la producción de cítricos tales como las naranjas, mandarinas ,tanyelo , entre otras.Comenta que anteriormente se dedicaba a la producción de cacao orgánico pero al no tener buenos resultados optó por cambiar sus  plantaciones y dedicarse a este nuevo rubro, decisión de la que no se arrepiente ya que obtiene muy buenas ganacias las cuales benefician a toda su familia.Se desempeña desde hace 3 años en esta actividad y comenta que le agrada mucho su trabajo puesto que a recibido buenos comentarios de parte de sus clientes lo cuales se han ido incrementando con el tiempo . Como parte de contar con un capital de respaldo para la compra de plantaciones y brindarles el mantenimiento del caso acude a esta entidad financiera para solictar 1,500 nuevos soles y proceder a la compra de pequeñas plantas con variedad de cítricos  y cultivarlos en sus parcelas . Tiene  como objetico a largo plazo fundar una asociación de productores dedicados al cultivo de cítricos y así expandir el mercado laboral  y asu vez mejorar la calidad de vida de muchos productores de cacao que al igual que el optarón por algo nuevo .
texts.en:
Simeón is 43 years old and married to Mery, age 42. They have two children. His main business activity is producing citrus fruits such as oranges, tangerines, tangelos, and others. Simeón said that he previously grew organic cacao, but he did not achieve good results. Therefore, he decided to switch to different crops and now he spends his time in this new endeavor. Having made this decision without any regrets, Simeón has already generated good earnings that benefit his entire family.

He has been in this line of work for three years and says that he enjoys it because of the positive feedback he has received from his customers, who have been growing in number over time. By having capital reserves, he will be able to buy plants and maintain them. This is why he approached MFP with a request of 1,500 PEN. He will proceed with the purchase of young citrus plants that he will cultivate on his land. Simeón’s long-term goal is to establish an association of citrus producers so that he can expand the job market and improve the lives of cacao producers like him who want to try something new.

loans.use: to buy young citrus plants.

loans.name: Rustamkhon

texts.ru:
Рустамхон житель района Хамадони. Ему 45 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Рустамхон живет с родителями. Его брат предоставляет услугу на своем тракторе. Рустамхон трудолюбивый и ответственный человек.
Рустамхон на протяжении пятнадцати лет занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Он выращивает овощи и сеет пшеницу. Рустамхон берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений, чтобы обработать землю.
texts.en: Rustamkhon lives in the Hamadoni region. He is 45 years old, married, and has 4 children. He lives with his parents. His brother works providing tractor services. Rustamkhon is a hardworking and responsible person. For the last 15 years he has been growing agricultural crops. He grows vegetables and plants wheat. He is now seeking a loan to buy mineral fertilizers so he can work his land.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers so he can work his land

loans.name: Mamyusuf

texts.ru:
Мамаюсуф добрый и порядочный человек. Он женат,имеет детей. Жена домохозяйка. Сам Мамаюсуф занимается откормом скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже много лет. Имеет очень хороший доход. Мамаюсуф хочет чтобы его семья жила в тепле и уюте. Он и его дети каждую осень собирают дрова со всех местностей и делают запасы на зиму, что бы как можно было прогреться. Но их старая печь со временем стала неисправной и уже не подлежит ремонту. Когда Мамаюсуф узнал,что в Арванде выдается энергосберегающая печь по продукту "зеленый кредит" он сразу же подал заявку. Это печь не только греет но на нем еще можно готовить еду, и печь лепешки.
 Он очень обрадовался что ему выпала такая возможность и может приобрести такую печь. Настоящий кредит берет для приобретении печи.
texts.en:
Mamyusuf is a good and decent man. He is married and has children. His wife is a homemaker. Mamyusuf himself is engaged in fattening livestock. He has been involved in these types of activities for many years. He has a very good income. 

Mamyusuf wants his family to live in warmth and comfort. He and his children gather wood every autumn from all areas and make stocks for the winter in order to be able to stay warm. But their old oven has in time became faulty and can not be repaired. When Mamyusuf learned that Arvand offers energy-efficient stoves as a "green credit" product, he immediately applied. This stove not only warms but can also be used to cook and bake flatbreads.
 
He was very happy that he was given this opportunity and can get this kind of stove. The present loan is for the purchase of the oven.

loans.use: to purchase an energy-saving stove

loans.name: Kina's Group

texts.en:
Age 41 and a rural farmer from Battambang Province, Kina is also a mother of three children. She strives for a living through 3.5 hectares of rice cropping and wrapping hashed meat with banana leaves for extra income. To add on to the family’s income, her husband also grows watermelon on two hectares of farmland and raises ten cows. For 15 years, Kina has been engaged in this business. She earns KHR 119,400 per day and saves KHR 10,000 per day, after deducting all expenses. 

This is the eighth cycle of loans for Kina and the seventh cycle for her co-borrower in their group of two. The past loans have improved support for Kina's business in a gradual way and she has completely repaid back her past loans already. 

Now, Kina and her fellow group member are seeking the same loan amount, KHR 1,400,000 each. For Kina, this loan portion will be used to support her husband’s business, watermelon-growing. She hopes to increase income, so that she can relieve her family's burden better than before.

loans.use: to support her husband’s business, watermelon-growing.

loans.name: Calacoto Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CALACOTO”  iniciará el sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Julia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de mantas, venta de ollas, venta de medias, venta de papa, venta de chatarras, producción de puertas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Julia es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una asesora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ollas; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió con hace varios años por iniciativa propia.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ollas) que adquirirá de las distribuidoras de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto fijo. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene seis hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta le gusta las capacitaciones en salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The “Calacoto” communal bank will start its sixth cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the German Busch focal center.  It has 8 members led by a governing board presided by Julia.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of business ventures among which are blanket weaving, pots sales, stockings sales, potato sales, recyclables sales and door making.

The loan they’ll take out will benefit small businesswomen like Julia.  She says she’s been a member of Pro Mujer for three years having joined thanks to an invitation from one of the institution’s promoters who visited her at home.  She currently has a business selling pots.  She relates that she started this business several years ago on her own initiative.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase capital.  She will buy pots from suppliers in the city of La Paz to then sell in her stand.  This way of working makes it possible for her to generate resources as possible since she’s married and has six children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the health training and the credit.

loans.use: to buy pots.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: Para don Humberto y su esposa quien se encarga del orden del hogar  su prioridad son sus tres hijos que aun son adolecentes menores de 17 años, solamente uno de ellos estudia, el señor continua con su labor como fontanero de una institución desde hace muchos años, el está solicitando su quinto crédito para infraestructura hará embaldosado y cambio de techo de la casa para este fin necesita comprar cemento, arena y laminas de zinc esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar la apariencia y el aseo del piso exterior para estar en mejores condiciones ahora que se aproxima la temporada de lluvia.
texts.en:
Humberto and his wife's priority is their three children. They are all teenagers under seventeen. Only one of them is in school. Their father still works as a plumber for a company where he has worked for many years. His wife is a homemaker.

He is requesting his fifth loan, which will go towards infrastructure: he will lay tile and replace the roof in his house. For this purpose he needs to buy cement, sand, and sheets of zinc. This investment will help him improve the appearance and neatness of the exterior flooring as well as condition his house for the next rainy season.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and sheets of zinc.

loans.name: Bezhan

texts.en: Bezhan is a 68-year-old retired farmer. He lives in the district of Khashuri with his 68-year-old retired wife, 42-year-old daughter and two grandchildren. His older grandson is helping Bezhan run the family business and the younger one goes to school. Bezhan has two oxen, which he uses to transport wood from the forest and sell it among his villagers. The family also owns a plot of land where they grow beans and a vineyard. With the harvested grapes, Bezhan makes wine and sells it with his harvested beans at the local market. He is a very hardworking man and has been in this business already for 50 years. With the requested loan, Bezhan wants to buy a milk cow. He will milk it and make cheese, which he will sell at the local market. It will increase his family's income and the profit will be used to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow for making cheese.

loans.name: Jipe Moyo Yombo Group

texts.en:
Zuhura,who is in her late twenties,is married with a boy who is still young. She originally managed a broiler business but has been working on another business, supplying cosmetics to different shops, for a period of six months now. She works from 8 am to 6 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be her third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to open her current business, cover her household expenses and pay back all her loans successfully. She will use this loan to increase her stock of cosmetics to meet customer demand. Her dream is to one day be able to have a business premises at which she can sell cosmetics at wholesale.

She will share this loan to her loan group Jipe Moyo Yombo, which has 18 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her stock of cosmetics to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is a 43-year-old woman living in the Khashuri district. She lives with her 57-year-old husband, who works at the railway station and gets a monthly salary. There are five more members living in this family: a son, a daughter, a daughter in-law, and two infant grandchildren. 

Nino has two milk cows and three calves. She milks the cows every day and makes cheese, which is sold locally at the market. The family also owns a large plot of agricultural land where they grow corn, beans, and wheat. Harvested products are sold locally. Besides this, Nino works as a daily worker in the local farmers’ fields seasonally to earn additional income. She has been working hard already for 20 years. 

Nino requested this loan to buy oxen. Her husband and son will use them for the transportation of wood, which will be sold locally. This will increase the family income and they will have the opportunity to make their living conditions better.

loans.use: to buy oxen to use for the transportation of wood.

loans.name: Retoños Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “RETOÑOS”  iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rebeca es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, tejido de mantas, carpintería, costura de polleras, repostería, tienda de barrio.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rebeca es integrante, ella indica que hace año y medio que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de muebles; cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió de su esposo, ya que el sabía este oficio, posteriormente deciden abrir su propio taller de carpintería.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de madera) que adquirirá de las barracas de la Paz y Oruro y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializara en la ciudad de El Alto. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones del área de salud.
texts.en:
The “Retoños” communal bank will start its third cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani Focal Center.  It has 8 members led by a governing board presided over by Rebeca.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of business ventures among which are food sales, blanket weaving, carpentry, sewing, pastry making and neighborhood store.

The loan they’ll take out will benefit small businesswomen like Rebeca.  She indicates that she’s been a member of Pro Mujer for a year and a half having joined thanks to an invitation from a girlfriend who is a member of the institution.  She currently has business selling furniture.  She relates that she learned this business from her husband since he knew this occupation.   Later on they decided to open their own carpentry shop.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase capital.  She will buy lumber from suppliers in La Paz and Oruro and after manufacture will sell in the city of El Alto.  This way of working makes it possible for her to earn resources to support her home the best way possible because she’s married and has five children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the health training.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Indiana Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña indiana es una clienta soltera no tiene hijos que mantener ya todos son mayores de edad e independientes que se buscan la vida solos, ella trabaja como dependiente en una tienda de abarroterías en un mercado desde hace cuatro años con una hermana, esta optando a su tercer crédito para infraestructura construcción de cuarto y mejorar su casa para ello necesitara comprar cemento, arena, bloques, hierro, aprovechando el espacio que le queda en su terreno para vivir un poco mas cómodos con su familia sin carecer de espacio y privacidad.
texts.en:
Indiana is a single client. She doesn't have children to support, since they are all adults and earn their own living. She has been working as a clerk at a grocery store in a market for four years with one of her sisters. 

She is requesting her third loan, which will be applied towards infrastructure. She will build a bedroom and improve her home. To this end she will need to buy cement, sand, blocks, and iron. She will take advantage of the space she has left on her plot so that her family can live more comfortably, with no lack of space or privacy.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks, and iron.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a third-time borrower at UGAFODE Microfinance Ltd (MDI). In the first and second cycle, he took a loan of 1,000,000 UGX and 500,000 UGX respectively. He paid well and on time. He is a married man of three children all studying in elementary school. His main source of income is riding a motorcycle that is owned by someone else; this has enabled him pay school fees for children and pay rent on his house. He applied for the loan to purchase a new motorcycle that will be his own and help him enhance his daily income. He also wants to purchase a piece of land in the near future. He hopes he will be able to build a residential house on it to house his family. In the photo is Robert with the Ugafode staff (left-right).

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Om's Group

texts.en:
Om is from a rural village in the Sa Ang district of Kandal province, Cambodia. She is a 65-year-old widowed mother of five children. She has struggled to feed her children by farming rice in the local area. Having been in this business for 40 years, she is able to earn about 70,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Om is just with VisionFund this cycle. She and her group members are requesting a loan of 150,000 KHR each. As the leader, Om will use her portion to buy materials to construct a decent latrine. She'll need cement, bricks, a latrine pan, etc. She hopes that this loan will enable her family to have a clean latrine for daily consumption so as to improve a healthy standard of living.

loans.use: to buy materials to construct a decent latrine.

loans.name: Noern's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Sampov Meas district of Pursat province, Noern is a 38-year-old married mother of six children, three of whom are dependent on her and still too young for school. 

Rice farming has been the main source of her family’s income for several years, and to better support the family and help to earn more income, her husband works as a paid construction worker in local area. They can earn about 33,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs and manage to save about 15,000 KHR each day for future needs.

Noern has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely paid back the past loan, while the other member is just with VisionFund this cycle. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan. Noern, who is the leader, wants to use her portion to buy a buffalo to help her in the rice field. She hopes to increase her crop yield so as to improve her standard of living and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy a buffalo to help in the rice field.

loans.name: Sam's Group

texts.en:
Sam is 57 years old, single, and living in a rural village of Pursat Province’s Kror Kor district. She earns a living through farming rice, which she has been doing for 15 years. The current business earns her about 17,000 KHR per day; she manages to save about 10,000 KHR each day for future needs. 

Sam’s group consists of two female members who just started with VisionFund this cycle. She is leading her group to apply for a loan. As the leader, she wants to use her portion to renovate her old house. 

Sam hopes this loan will enable her to have a proper house so her living conditions are better.

loans.use: To renovate her old house.

loans.name: Giyosidin

texts.ru:
Гиёсидин проживает в районе Хамадони. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Брат Гиёсидина занимается животноводством. Сам Гиёсидин выращивает овощи и сеет зернобобовые культуры. Этим видом деятельности он занимается три года. 
Гиёсидин берет кредит для обработки орошаемой земли.
texts.en: Giyosidin lives in the Hamadoni region. He is 25 years old, married and has 3 children. His brother works in animal husbandry. Giyosidin grows vegetables and grains, and has been doing this for the last 3 years. Giyosidin is seeking a loan to fertilize his land.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers
